about_the_game:
Do you have the courage to stand up against whoever is after you?
Even if that means you might have to go head-to-head with someone you considered a friend?
Find out in this thrilling true crime adventure game.

Someone is going to murder you. You've seen your death, and the vision is not letting you rest until you've found out exactly how much truth is behind it. Sure, you may have made some unfortunate choices here and there and been involved in one or the other unfortunate incident in the past, but that's all behind you now. And what your friends don't know can't hurt them, right?

But why do you still have that ominous feeling in your gut that someone is tracking your every move? And who would go to such lengths as to kill you? If your vision is to be believed, time is running out, and you're the target.





  • Check your relationship web to find out who you're acquainted with and how your relationship progresses throughout the story depending on the choices you make.
  • Consider all possible motives to find out who could be involved in your potential demise.
  • Be sure to keep an eye on those around you, but don't let them realize you suspect something, or there might be more than just your friendship on the line.



  • Collect clues and items that may be useful to you, even if they don't seem it at the time.
  • Be clever and merge the right items to reach a goal or escape from a sticky situation.
  • Quick decision-making is vital: Your enemy is closer than you think.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Depiction of blood or the mutilation of body parts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.3GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A graphic card thats supports at least DirectX 9 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Solve your own murder in this thrilling true crime adventure game. You've come face-to-face with your fate and someone close to you is going to kill you...unless you find out who it is before the time runs out!
